trulyartificialcarefThis is the packed together slim version of all the story text in the PC game Milky ways made by Kerni
Since I still need to merge it back together with the normal story function file please do nto destroy the format
The format is "UNIQUE ID "HASHKEY"TEXT"
Please do ONLY change the TEXT not the HASHKEY or the UNIQUE ID
Two hashkey are used :
MainText -> is the.. well maintext story text nromal stuff
If_story_text -> This is the alternative text depending on a trigger (for example if the arms are restrained from a girl and she can not use her hands)
Text inside of the PIPE signs (these things -> |text| ) are varibales, please do not erase them!


/////////////////////// START OF THE STORY TEXT DO NOT ERASE THIS LINE/////////////////////////////////
